page.title: 15The Law around Lydlinch
page.content: There is no local bobby these days. The police are organised on an area basis and this block is covered from the Sherborne Police headquarters. The nearest police station is in Sturminster and one of the constables from there has been assigned to Lydlinch calling at the village regularily. This is an attempt to try and make some personal contact between the police and the community which has been missing since the introduction of patrol cars. The situation is the same in Kingstag.
